answerText: Tender Buttons: objects, food, rooms[10] This author's many innovations in his USA Trilogy include the Camera Eye and Newsreel sections. The Camera Eyes consist of a loose autobiography.
heading: ACF Regionals  |2012 | South Carolina and Carlton | 20 | Literature | American | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: For 10 points each, name some things related to stylistic experiments in literature. [10] This Gertrude Stein book is basically a long poem consisting of word clusters chosen for how they sound together, instead of for semantic sense. It is divided into the sections Objects, Food, and Rooms.
